subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: Days before the home opener, the Mets showed off their prized structural addition for 2015 at Citi Field: a new video screen for the center-field scoreboard.
snippet: Days before the home opener, the Mets showed off their prized structural addition for 2015 at Citi Field: a new video screen for the center-field scoreboard.
